caseName: Linda R. S. v. Richard D.

wikiData.title: Linda R. S. v. Richard D.
wikiData.Litigants: Linda R. S. v. Richard D.
wikiData.FullName: Linda R.S. v. Richard D. Et al.
wikiData.Holding: Although appellant has an interest in her child's support, application of Art. 602 would not result in support but only in the father's incarceration, and a private citizen lacks a judicially cognizable interest in the prosecution or nonprosecution of another.
wikiData.LawsApplied: Art. 602 of the Texas Penal Code
